subSections.title: Readings
Usage notes
subSections.text: This character was added to the Jōyō kanji list in 2010 and adopted this simplified form. Before 2010 the unsimplified form {{m|ja|曾}} was the {{ja-r|印%刷 標%準 字%体|いん%さつ ひょう%じゅん じ%たい}}, and the simplified form {{m|ja|曽}} was a {{ja-r|簡%易 慣%用 字%体|かん%い かん%よう じ%たい}}.

subSections.title: Alternative forms
